channel.title: ECharts on 余不二五
channel.description: Recent content in ECharts on 余不二五

item.title: Echart散点图自定义图标
item.description: 参数如下： option = { title: { text: '对数轴示例', left: 'center' }, tooltip: { trigger: 'axis', axisPointer: { type: 'cross' }, formatter: '{a0}: {c0}<br />{a1}: {c1}<br/>' }, legend: { left: 'left', data: ['2的指数', '3的指数'] }, xAxis: { type: 'category', name: 'x', splitLine: {show: false}, data: ['一', '二', '三', '四', '五', '六', '七', '八', '九'] }, grid: { left: '3%', right: '4%', bottom: '3%', containLabel: true }, yAxis: { type: 'log', name: 'y', minorTick: { show: true }, minorSplitLine: { show: true } }, series: [ { name: '3的指数', type: 'line', data: [1, 3, 9, 27, 81, 247, 741, 2223, 6669] }, { tooltip:{ position: [10,10], formatter: 'dfjkdjf' }, name: '2的指数', type: 'line', data: [1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256] }, { tooltip:{ trigger: 'item', position: function (point, params, dom, rect, size) { // 固定在顶部 return [point[0], '90%']; }, formatter: function(params) { return params.
